metadata.title: CVE-2024-0584 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - high
metadata.description:
A use-after-free issue was found in igmp_start_timer in net/ipv4/igmp.c inthe network sub-component in the Linux Kernel. This flaw allows a localuser to observe a refcnt use-after-free issue when receiving an igmp querypacket, leading to a kernel information leak.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-0584` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-15-generic - 6.5.0-15.15
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-15-generic - 6.5.0-15.15
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-15-generic-64k - 6.5.0-15.15
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1012-aws - 6.5.0-1012.12
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1011-azure - 6.5.0-1011.11
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1011-gcp - 6.5.0-1011.11
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1008-laptop - 6.5.0-1008.11
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-15-lowlatency - 6.5.0-15.15.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-15-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-15.15.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.2.0-1003-oracle - 6.5.0-1015.15
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1009-raspi - 6.5.0-1009.12
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1006-starfive - 6.5.0-1006.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-15.15').
linux-aws package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1012.12').
linux-azure package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1011.11').
linux-gcp package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1011.11').
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support').
linux-laptop package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1008.11').
linux-lowlatency package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-15.15.1').
linux-oracle package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1015.15').
linux-raspi package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1009.12').
linux-starfive package in mantic is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.5.0-1006.7').
